name: Xtreme Flying Car Craft HD
description:
Driving a car on the road is too mainstream; it is the time to take a roller-coaster ride on a flying car. Get straight into the action and fly above the City. Fasten your seat belt and activate the airplane flight mode. Turn on the extreme flying simulator mode and experience what it feels like to be a real pilot. Futuristic flying car simulator is the exciting and addictive car racing game. Forget about the city traffic and gear up for an ultimate off-road racing experience. Explore the open city environment and move between the skyscrapers.
You can transform your driving skills and fly your car just like a professional pilot. There are multiple realistic environments that you can choose, which include: day/night, evening, snow falling and dusty.
Enjoy the ultimate 3d flight and race without any interruption, as your car driving skills will be tested to the ultimate level. This is the perfect blend of car race and jet flying techniques.
How to play
• Choose the Futuristic car of your choice.
• Gets the engine running, by tapping on the gear button.
• Tap on the icon on the left of your screen to fly the car.
• Tap on the ‘landing’ button to properly land your car.
Features:

• Realistic 3D graphics and animations.
• Extensive sports car selection.
• Exciting Futuristic car flying experience.
• Simple and smooth controls.
• Multiple missions, landing, taking off and more.
• Detailed and enhanced open World and city environment.
• Reward system for gameplay on the completion of each mission
